title: LeBron James and Deni Avdija React to Kyrie Irving Posts
description: “If you are promoting or soliciting or saying harmful things to any community that harm people, then I don’t respect it,” LeBron James said. “I don’t condone it.”
dc:creator: Shauntel Lowe
media:description: Deni Avdija, left, is the only N.B.A. player from Israel. “He needs to understand that he gives example to people, and people look up to him,” he said of Kyrie Irving.
